entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 15.1°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 2 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
